import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/card'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Home, Users, Bed, Calendar, Settings, LogOut, Bell, Menu, Search, User, ChevronDown, Clock, DollarSign, BarChart2, CreditCard, MessageSquare, Star, HelpCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Mock data for statistics const stats = [ { title: 'Total Revenue', value: '$12,345', change: '+12%', trend: 'up', icon: DollarSign }, { title: 'Occupancy Rate', value: '85%', change: '+5%', trend: 'up', icon: BarChart2 }, { title: 'Total Bookings', value: '128', change: '+8%', trend: 'up', icon: CreditCard }, { title: 'Avg. Rating', value: '4.8/5', change: '+0.2', trend: 'up', icon: Star }, ]; // Mock data for recent bookings const recentBookings = [ { id: 1, room: 'Deluxe Suite', guest: 'John Doe', checkIn: '2023-06-15', checkOut: '2023-06-20', status: 'Confirmed' }, { id: 2, room: 'Standard Room', guest: 'Jane Smith', checkIn: '2023-06-16', checkOut: '2023-06-18', status: 'Pending' }, { id: 3, room: 'Family Suite', guest: 'Robert Johnson', checkIn: '2023-06-17', checkOut: '2023-06-22', status: 'Confirmed' }, { id: 4, room: 'Executive Suite', guest: 'Emily Davis', checkIn: '2023-06-18', checkOut: '2023-06-21', status: 'Cancelled' }, ]; // Mock data for recent reviews const recentReviews = [ { id: 1, author: 'Michael Brown', rating: 5, comment: 'Excellent service and comfortable stay!', date: '2 days ago' }, { id: 2, author: 'Sarah Wilson', rating: 4, comment: 'Great location and friendly staff.', date: '3 days ago' }, ]; return (

); }; export default Dashboard; {/* */} // // // // // ); // }; // export default Dashboard;
